actions: Clears Heat and resolves Fire toxicity and clears Damp-Heat from the Lower Jiao.
Clears Damp-Heat, promotes urination and cools the Blood.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, binds the Intestines, stops bleeding, consolidates Jing and stops diarrhea.
